recipe.title: Toll House Pie

ingredient.name: butter
ingredient.form: melted and cooled to room temperature

ingredient.name: Nestle Toll House semi-sweet chocolate morsels

steps.step: In large bowl, beat eggs until foamy.
Add flour, sugar and brown sugar; beat until well blended.
Stir in Nestle Toll House semi-sweet chocolate morsels and walnuts.
Serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream, if desired.

recipe.comment: *If using frozen pie shell, it's necessary to use deep dish style, thawed. Place on cookie sheet and bake additional 10 minutes.
